SCTX:
Begin spuriousScript

short doOnce
short dieOnce
short fightmod

if ( GetDisabled == 0 )
	if ( GetJournalIndex BM_Smugglers < 30 )
		Disable
	endif
elseif ( GetDisabled == 1 )
	if ( GetJournalIndex BM_Smugglers >= 30 )
		Enable
	endif
endif		

if ( GetJournalIndex BM_Smugglers >= 30 )
	if ( GetJournalIndex BM_Smugglers < 90 )
		if ( GetDistance "saenus lusius"  <= 512 )
			if ( luciuschosen >= 1 )
				if ( doOnce == 0 )
					ForceGreeting
					StopCombat Player
					SetFight 30
					set doOnce to 1
				endif
			endif
		endif
	endif
endif

if ( OnDeath == 1 )
	if ( dieOnce == 0 )
		set smugDead to ( smugDead + 1 )
		set dieOnce to 1
	endif
endif





End spuriousScript
